name: OTS Solutions
overview:
OTS Solutions, a CMMI Level 3, ISO 9001 and 27000 certified software services company (http://www.otssolutions.com). We are a Microsoft Certified software services provider offering bespoke software development, testing & support services and staff augmentation services across the globe. We are a Microsoft, Apple and Android Partner for development.

OTS is a fast-growing progressive supplier of offshore software development services. We offer:

• Customised Application development Service on Microsoft Technologies including .Net - C#, VB.Net, ASP.Net, ADO.Net, Dynamics, MS SharePoint etc. (Microsoft Partner) • Bespoke development service on Java Technologies. • Bespoke development service on Delphi Technology. • Upgrading legacy systems to the latest Microsoft and Java technologies • Customise development service on open source technologies and various web technologies (PHP / PERL) • Development and Support on Windows, UNIX and LINUX systems • Web 2.0 Mobile and SaaS enablement • Development on iPhone and Android Applications • Software testing (unit test, UAT, Regression, SIT at client sites, Performance Testing, Test Automation) to improve quality of your products and reduce time to markets
